description: An advanced Android native Kotlin application template demonstrating comprehensive Salesforce Mobile SDK integration using MobileSync data framework with modern Android architecture. This template provides a production-ready contact management app with offline sync capabilities, Jetpack Compose UI, flexible layouts, and a sophisticated data layer architecture.
useCase: Use this template when you need to create a production-ready Android app with full Salesforce data synchronization capabilities and modern Android architecture. It's ideal for developers building enterprise-grade apps that require offline functionality, complex data relationships, flexible UI layouts, and professional-grade architecture patterns.

customizationPoints.description: Customize the app name, package name, and build configuration
instructions: Update template.js with new app name and package name
Modify package.json with new app name
Update build.gradle.kts with new package name
Update settings.gradle.kts with new app name
Update strings.xml with new app name

customizationPoints.description: Add new Salesforce objects beyond the default Contact
instructions: Create new SObject data classes implementing the SObject interface
Implement JSONObject.applyObjProperties() method
Add new object types to Constants
Create corresponding deserializers and repositories

customizationPoints.description: Extend the repository pattern for new SObjects
instructions: Create new repositories implementing SObjectSyncableRepo interface
Implement sync up/down operations for new objects

customizationPoints.description: Add new Jetpack Compose UI components
